title: Fitbit app gets clearance for AFib notifications on select trackers and smartwatches
content:
Just a few weeks after announcing its intentions, Fitbit and Google have today announced that clearance has been granted in the United States for select trackers and smartwatches to detect irregular AFib heart rhythms.

moreâ€¦

The post Fitbit app gets clearance for AFib notifications on select trackers and smartwatches appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Coming soon, some Fitbit trackers will be able to notify users of signs of AFib, a condition that could lead to a stroke.
